title: Discord Chat Bot
description: A Discord bot that reads user input and returns replies.
Created with Discord.js and hosted with Heroku.
Uses various APIs to display data from based on user inputs.
tech: Node.js with Discord.js library. Deployed with Heroku.

title: Maximum Tower
description: Tower defense game made with funny sprites.
2016 Davis Game Development Club Fall Game Jam submission. Winner of People's Choice Award.
Disclaimer: Source Code no longer available on website.
tech: Made with Unity C#. Assets drawn with Piskel.
